## Loading the data

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()`

```{r}
candidates %>%
  filter(cand_election_yr > 2010 & cand_election_yr < 2013) %>%
  filter(cand_party_affiliation != "UNK")
```
